scripts.clean: npx rimraf .serverless .turbo node_modules dist bin coverage && find . -name '*.tsbuildinfo' -type f -delete || exit 0
scripts.dev: yarn build && npx sls offline start --noTimeout --stage local --lambdaPort 3032
scripts.start: yarn build && npx sls offline start --noTimeout --stage local --lambdaPort 3032
scripts.start:localstack: yarn build && npx sls offline start --noTimeout --stage local --lambdaPort 3032
